markdownRemark.html: We are organizing open mic nights and author readings connected with Second Saturday Art Nights. If you know of a venue in downtown Sonora interested in hosting poetry and short story nights, please email Kate at katelynsills@gmail.com.

frontmatter.title: Sonora Author Readings
frontmatter.description: We are organizing open mic nights and author readings connected with Second Saturday Art Nights.
